name: Scott Demetrius
bio: Scott leads DA+D Inc. with over 20 years of experience in residential and commercial architecture. His design philosophy centers on creating spaces that enhance human connection with the environment.

name: Derek Au
bio: Derek brings expertise in interior design and sustainable building practices. He specializes in creating cohesive design narratives that bridge architecture and interiors.

name: James Wilson
bio: James oversees project execution from concept through completion. His background in construction management ensures that designs are realized with precision and efficiency.

name: Sarah Chen
bio: Sarah integrates natural systems into architectural design, creating outdoor spaces that complement and enhance the built environment.

name: Michael Torres
bio: Michael brings over 15 years of experience in high-end residential design. His expertise lies in creating innovative spaces that seamlessly blend modern aesthetics with traditional functionality.

name: Elena Vasquez
bio: Elena focuses on integrating eco-friendly solutions into all projects. She has a background in environmental science and specializes in LEED certification and energy-efficient building systems.
